com.company.mjo.Controller

Interface ITwitterController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TwitterController

    public interface ITwitterController
    Created by mjo on 10/17/2014. Interface used for separation of concerns, maintainability and testability.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendStatus(java.lang.String status)
      Appends text in status view.
      void clearStatus()
      Clears text from status view.
      void displayTimelineTweet(java.lang.String accountName)
      Retrieve tweet from Twitter timeline and display.

      Provides access to ITwitterModel interface.
      void setView(ITwitterView view)
      Provides access to ITwitterView interface.
      void showView(boolean show)
      Show/hide ITwitterView UI
      void validateCredentials(java.lang.String consumerKey, java.lang.String consumerSecret)
      Twitter Authentication ConsumerKey and ConsumerSecret used for access to Twitter Restful API.

    • Method Detail

      • validateCredentials

        void validateCredentials(java.lang.String consumerKey,
                         java.lang.String consumerSecret)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Twitter Authentication ConsumerKey and ConsumerSecret used for access to Twitter Restful API. Retrieve this information by signing up for Twitter developer account at https://dev.twitter.com/.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Consumer Key from dev.twitter.com
        consumerSecret - Consumer Secret from dev.twitter.com
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • displayTimelineTweet

        void displayTimelineTweet(java.lang.String accountName)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieve tweet from Twitter timeline and display.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Public Twitter Account, ie. twitterapi
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
